body: An Ordinary Citizen wonders  whether there are any political reasons behind the indictments against Bangladeshi Nobel laureate Dr. Muhammad Yunus and asks: "does Dr. Yunus represent the 3rd force in Bangladesh?"
original_body: An Ordinary Citizen wonders whether there are any political reasons behind the indictments against Bangladeshi Nobel laureate Dr. Muhammad Yunus and asks: "does Dr. Yunus represent the 3rd force in Bangladesh?"
title: Bangladesh: Politics And Dr. Yunus
